column4: I have just installed Gusty, alternate CD, and the first thing I did was to remove Compiz. And now I seem to be stranded without a window manager. I need to start a terminal, enter 'metacity', hit enter and leave that open to get a window manger.
I have tried to put metacity as something to run per gdm session but it doesn't seem to help.
add metacity in system > preferences > sessions
Tried that but to no avail. :( Even tried upping the sequence of that session command to 99 but still nothing. I still have to manualy start it.
